en_title: Secretary for Justice castigates the violent mob in London
zh_title: 律政司司長嚴厲斥責倫敦暴徒行為

en: The Secretary for Justice castigates the violent mob in London today (November 14, London time) causing her serious bodily harm on her way to an event venue. The Secretary immediately made a report to the London Police and requested the Police to take the case seriously and put the culprits to justice.

The Secretary denounces all forms of violence and radicalism depriving others' legitimate rights in the pretext of pursuing their political ideals, which would never be in the interest of Hong Kong and any civilised society.
zh: 律政司司長今日（倫敦時間十一月十四日）在倫敦前往一活動場地途中遇襲，司長嚴厲斥責該等暴徒令其身體受到嚴重傷害。她已即時向倫敦警察報案，並要求當地警方嚴肅跟進將兇徒繩之於法。
司長嚴詞批評任何形式的暴力及極端主義，假借追求政治為名剝削他人的合法權利，此等行為對香港以至任何一個文明地方均是百害而無一利。
